mapper.select: SELECT C.CNSLT_ID, C.CNSLT_SJ, C.CNSLT_CN, C.OTHBC_AT, C.WRITNG_PASSWORD, C.AREA_NO, C.MIDDLE_TELNO, C.END_TELNO, C.FRST_MBTLNUM, C.MIDDLE_MBTLNUM, C.END_MBTLNUM, C.EMAIL_ADRES, C.EMAIL_ANSWER_AT, C.WRTER_NM , C.WRITNG_DE, C.RDCNT, C.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE, D.CODE_NM QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE_NM, C.MANAGT_CN,C.MANAGT_DE , C.ATCH_FILE_ID, A.USER_NM, A.OFFM_TELNO, A.EMAIL_ADRES AEMAIL_ADRES, B.ORGNZT_NM , TO_CHAR(C.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , C.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(C.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , C.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNCNSLTLIST C LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE D ON D.CODE_ID ='COM028' AND C.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = D.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO A ON A.ESNTL_ID= C.LAST_UPDUSR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO B ON A.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID WHERE CNSLT_ID=#{cnsltId}

SELECT CNSLT_ID, CNSLT_SJ, CNSLT_CN, OTHBC_AT, WRITNG_PASSWORD, AREA_NO, MIDDLE_TELNO, END_TELNO, FRST_MBTLNUM, MIDDLE_MBTLNUM, END_MBTLNUM, EMAIL_ADRES, EMAIL_ANSWER_AT, WRTER_NM , WRITNG_DE, RDCNT INQIRE_CO, QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE, QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE_NM, MANAGT_CN, MANAGT_DE, ATCH_FILE_ID, USER_NM, OFFM_TELNO, EMAIL_ADRES AEMAIL_ADRES, ORGNZT_NM , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,CNS.* FROM ( SELECT C.CNSLT_ID, C.CNSLT_SJ, C.CNSLT_CN, C.OTHBC_AT, C.WRITNG_PASSWORD, C.AREA_NO, C.MIDDLE_TELNO, C.END_TELNO, C.FRST_MBTLNUM, C.MIDDLE_MBTLNUM, C.END_MBTLNUM, C.EMAIL_ADRES, C.EMAIL_ANSWER_AT, C.WRTER_NM , C.WRITNG_DE, C.RDCNT, C.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE, D.CODE_NM QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE_NM, C.MANAGT_CN, C.MANAGT_DE, C.ATCH_FILE_ID, A.USER_NM, A.OFFM_TELNO, A.EMAIL_ADRES AEMAIL_ADRES, B.ORGNZT_NM , C.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , C.FRST_REGISTER_ID, C.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , C.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNCNSLTLIST C LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE D ON D.CODE_ID ='COM028' AND C.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = D.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO A ON A.ESNTL_ID= C.LAST_UPDUSR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO B ON A.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND WRTER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND CNSLT_SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY CNSLT_SJ DESC ) CNS ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{recordCountPerPage} and RNUM > #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNCNSLTLIST WHERE 1=1
AND WRTER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND CNSLT_SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
